prompt: A whimsical underwater scene showing a simple but enchanting ancient pearl necklace resting atop an old, cracked treasure chest partially buried in coral sand. Small schools of colorful fish swim around, and sea plants gently sway in the water. The necklace itself glows faintly, casting an inviting light on the surrounding coral and sea floor. The image is vibrant and detailed, capturing the serene beauty of the underwater world with soft, shimmering light filtering down from the surface.
